channel.title: Looks like a downgrade attack
channel.description:
Hallo, after last update+dist-upgrade I have new bugs
whonixcheck says: installed TB version 4.5, available versions 4.5 4.5a 4.0.8... please run Tor browser updater.
TB updater tells me this: Installed version 4.5, available versions 4.5 4.5a 4.0.8..Looks like a downgrade attack!
One more bug: On tor browser, when I run check.torproject.org and some whatismyIP page, there are different IPs. Before both pages gave me same IP addresses, now they are always different.
Safe to ignore these bugs?

item.title: Looks like a downgrade attack
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Fixed local version parser in tb-updater:

github.com/Whonix/tb-updater

tbbversion_installed parser fix

committed 08:14PM - 04 May 15 UTC
adrelanos
+1 -1

That will fix tb-updater and whonixcheck issue.

Will land in > 2.0-1, perhaps Whonix 11.

Read full topic

item.title: Looks like a downgrade attack
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
The intelligence of the user is required unfortunately. You shouldn’t learn to blindly dismiss it. Read. Draw conclusions. Act accordingly.

See also documentation:

Whonix – 3 May 20

Tor Browser Basics

Using Tor Browser in Whonix ™. Anonymity vs Pseudonymity, HTTPS Everywhere, Torbutton, Protection against dangerous JavaScript, NoScript, Tips, Update Tor Browser, Browser Plugins, Change Language

One more bug: On tor browser, when I run check.torproject.org and some whatismyIP page, there are different IPs. Before both pages gave me same IP addresses, now they are always different.
Not a bug. -> new TBB feature; https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Stream_Isolation

Read full topic

item.title: Looks like a downgrade attack
item.dc:creator: jimmy89
item.description:
Hallo, after last update+dist-upgrade I have new bugs

whonixcheck says: installed TB version 4.5, available versions 4.5 4.5a 4.0.8… please run Tor browser updater.

TB updater tells me this: Installed version 4.5, available versions 4.5 4.5a 4.0.8…Looks like a downgrade attack!

One more bug: On tor browser, when I run check.torproject.org and some whatismyIP page, there are different IPs. Before both pages gave me same IP addresses, now they are always different.

Safe to ignore these bugs?

Read full topic
